ygData.msgSnippet: thats why i said take in both full and windowed... and yes a GM (not a guide) gave me a email adress and i sent them and the person harrasing me was banned for
ygData.messageBody:
thats why i said take in both full and windowed... and yes a GM (not a
guide) gave me a email adress and i sent them and the person harrasing me
was banned for 7 days. the GM did not see it, and i had 4 screen shots in
each mode and 5 people that wittensed a thing he accidently said out loud.
i wont even go into what he said, i wouldnt repeat any of it, and i only
didnt put him on ignore cuz i wanted him to pay for it... and he did
